title: Stars Hollow Life
description: Explore the charming town and its traditions!

questions.question: What festival features a dance marathon?
questions.explanation: The 24-hour Stars Hollow Dance Marathon is a beloved annual tradition with a trophy prize!

questions.question: The Dragonfly Inn is the inn Lorelai and Sookie open together.
questions.explanation: Lorelai and Sookie fulfill their dream by opening the Dragonfly Inn together.

questions.question: What store does Taylor Doose own?
questions.explanation: Taylor owns Doose's Market, the town's grocery store, among his many business ventures.

questions.question: What is above Luke's Diner?
questions.explanation: Luke lives in the apartment above the diner, which was originally his father's hardware store.

questions.question: What annual event does Lorelai hate attending?
questions.explanation: Friday Night Dinners at Emily and Richard's become mandatory when they agree to pay for Chilton.

questions.question: Stars Hollow has a town troubadour who sings on the streets.
questions.explanation: The Town Troubadour is a recurring character who performs folk songs around Stars Hollow.

questions.question: What is the name of the local bookstore?
questions.explanation: Stars Hollow Books is run by Andrew and is one of Rory's favorite places in town.

questions.question: What state is Stars Hollow located in?
questions.explanation: Stars Hollow is a fictional town in Connecticut, about 30 minutes from Hartford.
